rev.comment: it seems there are several of them

A bitcoin account can be compromised if a wallet file is left unprotected. On the 16th June 2011 Infostealer.Coinbit, a piece of Windows malware specifically designed to steal bitcoin wallets was discovered.<ref>http://www.wired.com/threatlevel/2011/06/bitcoin-malware/</ref><ref>http://www.symantec.com/connect/blogs/all-your-bitcoins-are-ours</ref><ref>http://www.symantec.com/security_response/writeup.jsp?docid=2011-061615-3651-99</ref><ref>http://www.f-secure.com/weblog/archives/00002187.html</ref>
